testcase.name: ToDo page visible
testcase.system-out: Given I am on my todo manage page...........................................passed Then I should see todos header displayed....................................passed

testcase.name: Enter ToDO items
testcase.system-out: When I input my "Haircut" and enter.........................................passed Then I should see "Haircut" added to the list...............................passed And toDo count incremented..................................................passed

testcase.name: Enter ToDO items 4

testcase.name: ToDo item mark as complete
testcase.system-out: When I click a toDoItemÂ checkbox and enter..................................passed Then I should see toDoItem marked as completed..............................passed And toDo count updated......................................................passed

testcase.name: Filter Test Cases
testcase.system-out: When I click on Active filter...............................................passed Then I should see only not completed items..................................passed When I click on Completed filter............................................passed Then I should see only completed items......................................passed When I click on All filter..................................................passed Then I should see all items in toDo list....................................passed

testcase.name: Mark All as Complete
testcase.system-out: When I click on Mark all as Complete........................................passed Then I should not see any active items......................................passed And I should see all items completed........................................passed

testcase.name: Clear Completed
testcase.system-out: When I click on Clear Completed.............................................passed Then I should not see completed items.......................................passed
